verses.text: And the rulers of the people dwelt at Jerusalem : the rest of the people also cast lots , to bring one of ten to dwell in Jerusalem the holy city , and nine parts \add to dwell\add* in \add other\add* cities.
And the people blessed all the men , that willingly offered themselves to dwell at Jerusalem. \p

¶ Now these \add are\add* the chief of the province that dwelt in Jerusalem : but in the cities of Judah dwelt every one in his possession in their cities , \add to wit\add*, Israel , the priests , and the Levites , and the Nethinims , and the children of Solomon’s servants.

And at Jerusalem dwelt \add certain\add* of the children of Judah , and of the children of Benjamin. Of the children of Judah ; Athaiah the son of Uzziah , the son of Zechariah , the son of Amariah , the son of Shephatiah , the son of Mahalaleel , of the children of Perez ;\f + \fr 11.4 \ft Perez: also called, Pharez\f*
And Maaseiah the son of Baruch , the son of Col-hozeh , the son of Hazaiah , the son of Adaiah , the son of Joiarib , the son of Zechariah , the son of Shiloni.
All the sons of Perez that dwelt at Jerusalem \add were\add* four hundred threescore and eight valiant men.
And these \add are\add* the sons of Benjamin ; Sallu the son of Meshullam , the son of Joed , the son of Pedaiah , the son of Kolaiah , the son of Maaseiah , the son of Ithiel , the son of Jesaiah.
And after him Gabbai , Sallai , nine hundred twenty and eight.
And Joel the son of Zichri \add was\add* their overseer : and Judah the son of Senuah \add was\add* second over the city.
Of the priests : Jedaiah the son of Joiarib , Jachin.
Seraiah the son of Hilkiah , the son of Meshullam , the son of Zadok , the son of Meraioth , the son of Ahitub , \add was\add* the ruler of the house of God.

And their brethren that did the work of the house \add were\add* eight hundred twenty and two : and Adaiah the son of Jeroham , the son of Pelaliah , the son of Amzi , the son of Zechariah , the son of Pashur , the son of Malchiah ,
And his brethren , chief of the fathers , two hundred forty and two : and Amashai the son of Azareel , the son of Ahasai , the son of Meshillemoth , the son of Immer ,

And their brethren , mighty men of valour , an hundred twenty and eight : and their overseer \add was\add* Zabdiel , the son of \add one of\add* the great men.\f + \fr 11.14 \ft the son…: or, the son of Haggedolim\f*
Also of the Levites : Shemaiah the son of Hashub , the son of Azrikam , the son of Hashabiah , the son of Bunni ;
And Shabbethai and Jozabad , of the chief of the Levites , \add had\add* the oversight of the outward business of the house of God.\f + \fr 11.16 \ft had…: Heb. were over\f*

And Mattaniah the son of Micha , the son of Zabdi , the son of Asaph , \add was\add* the principal to begin the thanksgiving in prayer : and Bakbukiah the second among his brethren , and Abda the son of Shammua , the son of Galal , the son of Jeduthun.
All the Levites in the holy city \add were\add* two hundred fourscore and four.
Moreover the porters , Akkub , Talmon , and their brethren that kept the gates , \add were\add* an hundred seventy and two.\f + \fr 11.19 \ft the gates: Heb. at the gates\f* \p
¶ And the residue of Israel , of the priests , \add and\add* the Levites , \add were\add* in all the cities of Judah , every one in his inheritance.
But the Nethinims dwelt in Ophel : and Ziha and Gispa \add were\add* over the Nethinims.\f + \fr 11.21 \ft Ophel: or, the tower\f*

The overseer also of the Levites at Jerusalem \add was\add* Uzzi the son of Bani , the son of Hashabiah , the son of Mattaniah , the son of Micha. Of the sons of Asaph , the singers \add were\add* over the business of the house of God.
For \add it was\add* the king’s commandment concerning them, that a certain portion should be for the singers , due for every day.\f + \fr 11.23 \ft a certain…: or, a sure ordinance\f*

And Pethahiah the son of Meshezabeel , of the children of Zerah the son of Judah , \add was\add* at the king’s hand in all matters concerning the people.\f + \fr 11.24 \ft Zerah: also called, Zarah\f*

And for the villages , with their fields , \add some\add* of the children of Judah dwelt at Kirjath-arba , and \add in\add* the villages thereof, and at Dibon , and \add in\add* the villages thereof, and at Jekabzeel , and \add in\add* the villages thereof,
And at Jeshua , and at Moladah , and at Beth-phelet ,
And at Hazar-shual , and at Beer-sheba , and \add in\add* the villages thereof,
And at Ziklag , and at Mekonah , and in the villages thereof,
And at En-rimmon , and at Zareah , and at Jarmuth ,
Zanoah , Adullam , and \add in\add* their villages , at Lachish , and the fields thereof, at Azekah , and \add in\add* the villages thereof. And they dwelt from Beer-sheba unto the valley of Hinnom.
The children also of Benjamin from Geba \add dwelt\add* at Michmash , and Aija , and Beth-el , and \add in\add* their villages ,\f + \fr 11.31 \ft from: or, of\f*\f + \fr 11.31 \ft at: or, to\f*
\add And\add* at Anathoth , Nob , Ananiah ,
Hazor , Ramah , Gittaim ,
Hadid , Zeboim , Neballat ,
Lod , and Ono , the valley of craftsmen.
And of the Levites \add were\add* divisions \add in\add* Judah , \add and\add* in Benjamin.
